_sText:
Map Info
===========
*cs_officeassault
*Counter-Strike Source
*By Derek "aliceschain" Braun
 North Dakota, USA


mail: aliceschain@gmail.com
AIM: dissentone

Description:
===========
Terrorists have seized 4 key hostages at a secure office building. Rescue the hostages and escort them to safety. There are many ways to enter the building, including some "creative" ways into the second floor. However, there are 2 main choke-points for rescuing the hostages; excercise extreme caution! 

Special Thanks:
===========
Mike Reinerz, Bill Koch (beta testing) 
Samuel Villareal (guidance)
